## BrowserScriptHostBridge class

A script host brigde that runs code inside an IFRAME element

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class BrowserScriptHostBridge implements ScriptHostBridge 
```
<b>Implements:</b> ScriptHostBridge
